Package ohos.sysappcomponents.settings

Class SystemSettings.General

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sysappcomponents.settings.SystemSettings.General
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemSettings

    public static class SystemSettings.General
extends Object
    Provides methods for setting general information about devices, including the device name, startup wizard, airplane mode, debugging information, accessibility feature switch, and touch exploration status.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Detail

      • ACCELEROMETER_ROTATION_STATUS

        public static final String ACCELEROMETER_ROTATION_STATUS
        Specifies whether the accelerometer is used to change screen orientation, that is, whether auto-rotation is enabled.

        The value 1 indicates that the accelerometer is enabled by default, and 0 indicates that the accelerometer is disabled by default.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESSIBILITY_STATUS

        public static final String ACCESSIBILITY_STATUS
        Specifies whether any accessibility feature is enabled.

        If the value is 1, the accessibility feature is enabled. If the value is 0, the accessibility feature is disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTIVATED_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICES

        public static final String ACTIVATED_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICES
        Indicates the list of accessibility features that have been activated.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AIRPLANE_MODE_STATUS

        public static final String AIRPLANE_MODE_STATUS
        Specifies whether airplane mode is enabled.

        If the value is 1, airplane mode is enabled. If the value is 0, airplane mode is disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BOOT_COUNTING

        public static final String BOOT_COUNTING
        Indicates the number of boot operations after the device is powered on.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTACT_METADATA_SYNC_STATUS

        public static final String CONTACT_METADATA_SYNC_STATUS
        Specifies whether contact metadata synchronization is enabled.

        If the value is true, synchronization is enabled. If the value is false, synchronization is disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEBUGGER_WAITING

        public static final String DEBUGGER_WAITING
        Specifies whether the device waits for the debugger when starting an application to debug.

        If the value is 1, the device waits for the debugger. If the value is 0, the system does not wait for the debugger, and so the application runs normally.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEBUG_APP_PACKAGE

        public static final String DEBUG_APP_PACKAGE
        Indicates the bundle name of the application to debug.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEVELOPMENT_SETTINGS_STATUS

        public static final String DEVELOPMENT_SETTINGS_STATUS
        Specifies whether developer options are enabled.

        If the value is true, developer options are enabled. If the value is false, developer options are disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEVICE_NAME

        public static final String DEVICE_NAME
        Indicates the device name.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEVICE_PROVISION_STATUS

        public static final String DEVICE_PROVISION_STATUS
        Specifies whether the device is provisioned.

        On a multi-user device with a single system user, the screen may be locked when the value is true. In addition, other abilities cannot be started on the system user unless they are marked to display over the screen lock.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • END_BUTTON_ACTION

        public static final String END_BUTTON_ACTION
        Specifies what happens after the user presses the call end button if the user is not in a call.
        • 0 - Nothing happens.
        • 1 - The home screen is displayed.
        • 2 - The device enters the sleep state and the screen is locked.
        • 3 - The home screen is displayed. If the user is already on the home screen, the device enters the sleep state.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GEOLOCATION_ORIGINS_ALLOWED

        public static final String GEOLOCATION_ORIGINS_ALLOWED
        Indicates the default geographical location that can be used by the browser. Multiple geographical locations are separated by spaces.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HDC_STATUS

        public static final String HDC_STATUS
        Specifies whether the hard disk controller (HDC) on USB devices is enabled.

        If the value is true, the HDC is enabled. If the value is false, the HDC is disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SETUP_WIZARD_FINISHED

        public static final String SETUP_WIZARD_FINISHED
        Specifies whether the startup wizard has been run.

        If the value is 0, the startup wizard has not been run. If the value is not 0, the startup wizard has been run.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SKIP_USE_HINTS

        public static final String SKIP_USE_HINTS
        Specifies whether an application should attempt to skip all introductory hints at the first startup. This is intended for temporary users or users who are familiar with the environment.

        If the value is 1, the application attempts to skip all introductory hints at the first startup. If the value is 0, the application does not skip introductory hints at the first startup.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TOUCH_EXPLORATION_STATUS

        public static final String TOUCH_EXPLORATION_STATUS
        Indicates whether touch exploration is enabled.

        If the value is 1, touch exploration is enabled. If the value is 0, touch exploration is disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USB_STORAGE_STATUS

        public static final String USB_STORAGE_STATUS
        Specifies whether USB mass storage is enabled.

        If the value is true, USB mass storage is enabled. If the value is false, USB mass storage is disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
